backend/main.mo: Simple canister storing and retrieving caller-specific canister IDs using a Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping redesign requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Guide for configuring a custom domain for the IC-hosted ElectroBeez app with DNS and boundary node steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, glassmorphism utilities, and dark-mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, and loading the app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering LandingPage and ensuring redeploy marker inclusion.
frontend/src/components/landing/AmbientB: Component rendering animated ambient orbs and gradient shimmer unless reduced-motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes all landing-page sections with ambient effects and a white background layout.
frontend/src/components/landing/SectionN: Sticky scroll-reactive navigation bar with smooth scrolling, mobile menu, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/landing/sections: About section with user and electrician feature cards using glassmorphism and icon lists.
Displays a grid of benefit cards highlighting project advantages using icons and styled UI components.
Shows budget breakdown cards with costs and descriptions plus a total budget card and donate button.
Renders donation options including a QR scan section and detailed bank transfer information within a styled card.
Provides footer content with branding, navigation links, contact details, and dynamic year display.
Defines the hero banner with logo, tagline, call‑to‑action buttons, and feature highlight cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider to manage Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and exposing login state helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, glassmorphism components, and ambient animation utilities for the site's visual theme.
frontend/src/lib/contact.ts: Exports centralized contact details including email and phone in raw and display formats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/redeployMarker.ts: Exports a timestamped marker object to force bundle changes for redeployment.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, animations, typography, and dark mode support.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, design notes, known issues, and deployment state.
